testcase.name: E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Complete E2EE Lifecycle > should complete full encrypted message exchange between Alice and Bob
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Complete E2EE Lifecycle > should handle bidirectional encrypted conversation
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Complete E2EE Lifecycle > should prevent unauthorized decryption by third party
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Key Registration and Rotation > should register, rotate, and verify key updates
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Key Registration and Rotation > should batch query keys for multiple users
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Key Registration and Rotation > should delete key and disable E2EE
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Group E2EE with Sender Keys > should complete group encrypted message flow
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Group E2EE with Sender Keys > should reject sender key upload from non-member
E2E: Encrypted Message Flow > Group E2EE with Sender Keys > should auto-increment sender key generations
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Complete Group Messaging Lifecycle > should deliver group message to all members
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Complete Group Messaging Lifecycle > should support multi-sender conversation in group
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Complete Group Messaging Lifecycle > should deliver messages only to current members
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should prevent non-member from sending messages
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should prevent non-member from reading message history
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should block messages after member is removed
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Non-Member Restrictions > should block messages after member leaves
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Encrypted Group Messages > should support encrypted flag on group creation
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Encrypted Group Messages > should support sending encrypted content in group messages
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Message History and Pagination > should return messages in reverse chronological order
E2E: Group Messaging Flow > Message History and Pagination > should support limit parameter for pagination
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should enforce owner/admin/member permission hierarchy
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should allow admin to remove member but not other admins
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should only allow owner to promote/demote members
E2E: Group Permission Management > Role-Based Access Control > should prevent changing owner role
E2E: Group Permission Management > Group Deletion > should only allow owner to delete group
E2E: Group Permission Management > Owner Leave Restriction > should prevent owner from leaving the group
E2E: Group Permission Management > Public vs Private Groups > should allow joining public group without invitation
E2E: Group Permission Management > Public vs Private Groups > should require invitation for private group
E2E: Group Permission Management > Member Limit Enforcement > should enforce max member limit
E2E: Group Permission Management > Member Limit Enforcement > should allow joining after member leaves
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should support full invitation lifecycle: invite -> view -> accept
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should support invitation rejection
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should prevent duplicate invitations
E2E: Group Permission Management > Invitation Workflow > should prevent inviting existing members
E2E: Group Permission Management > Group Update Permissions > should allow owner and admin to update group info
E2E: Group Permission Management > Group Update Permissions > should prevent member from updating group info
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > Complete Inbound Webhook Flow > should deliver external message to all friends via public visibility
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > Complete Inbound Webhook Flow > should deliver to specific recipients via toClawIds
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > HMAC Signature Verification > should reject request with missing signature header
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > HMAC Signature Verification > should reject request with invalid signature
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > HMAC Signature Verification > should reject signature computed with wrong secret
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > HMAC Signature Verification > should reject when payload is tampered after signing
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > Webhook State Validation > should reject incoming request on outgoing webhook
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > Webhook State Validation > should reject when webhook is disabled
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > Webhook State Validation > should reject for non-existent webhook id
E2E: Webhook Inbound Message Flow > Webhook CRUD Integration > should complete full webhook lifecycle: create -> use -> list deliveries -> delete
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Outgoing Webhook CRUD > should create outgoing webhook with URL and events
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Outgoing Webhook CRUD > should require URL for outgoing webhooks
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Outgoing Webhook CRUD > should update webhook URL and events
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Outgoing Webhook CRUD > should prevent other users from accessing your webhooks
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Circuit Breaker Mechanism > should auto-disable webhook after 10 consecutive failures
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Circuit Breaker Mechanism > should reset failure count when re-enabling webhook
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Delivery Log > should track delivery attempts
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > Delivery Log > should prevent non-owner from viewing delivery log
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block localhost (http://localhost:8080/admin)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block 127.0.0.1 (http://127.0.0.1:8080/admin)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block 10.x.x.x (http://10.0.0.1/internal)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block 172.16.x.x (http://172.16.0.1/internal)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block 192.168.x.x (http://192.168.1.1/router)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block AWS metadata (http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block GCP metadata (http://metadata.google.internal/computeMetadata/v1/)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block IPv6 localhost (http://[::1]:8080/admin)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block file protocol (file:///etc/passwd)
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > SSRF Protection > should block SSRF on webhook URL update
E2E: Webhook Outbound Events Flow > HMAC Signature Generation > should generate valid HMAC-SHA256 signatures for outgoing payloads
